abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Geometry POLYGON((5.96046 75.78059,35.91517 75.78059,35.91517 80.8717,5.96046 80.8717,5.96046 75.78059))", "TaxonKey is Plantae", "Year 2000-2023" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 111 records from Sea ice and seawater Raw sequence reads 58 records from University of Tartu Natural History Museum and Botanical Garden Botanical Collections 7 records from World Plant Specimen from the Herbaria in China 269 records from Antarctic Plant Database 211 records from Vascular plant herbarium TRH, NTNU University Museum 42 records from NaGISA Project 206 records from INSDC Environment Sample Sequences 71 records from naturgucker 5 records from Bryophyte herbarium, The Arctic University Museum of Norway (TROM) 67 records from Natural History Museum, Vienna - Herbarium W 84 records from Bacterial biogeography of a High Arctic ice cap 72 records from SSU rRNA amplicon of the Arctic Ocean during Winter-Spring Transition 14 records from Controls on microalgal community structures in cryoconite holes upon high Arctic glaciers, Svalbard 1 records from Tiroler Landesmuseum Ferdinandeum 523 records from Ecofact 28 records from Shotgun Metagenomic Sequencing of the Arctic Ocean during Winter-Spring Transition 44 records from Phytoplankton from the White Sea, Barents Sea, Norwegian Sea and Arctic Basin 1993-2003 3 records from Nansen Legacy JC1 phytoplankton biodiversity 2 records from Carnet en Ligne 399 records from Arctic microbiome along Svalbard Cross Shelf transects 927 records from Vascular plant herbarium, The Arctic University Museum of Norway (TROM) 5 records from Artsprosjektet 43-15, Norway's hidden marine biodiversity: The hunt for cryptic species within the coralline algae 75 records from Culture Collection of Cryophilic Algae 11 records from University of Graz, Institute of Plant Sciences -
